challenges.title: The 6 challenges slowing your growth

turnover.title: Explosive turnover
turnover.description: 70% turnover in some sectors (BPO, retail, tech). Training an employee who leaves after 6 months costs a fortune.
turnover.impact: Loss of productivity, repeated recruitment costs, team demotivation.

onboarding.title: Endless onboarding
onboarding.description: 3 to 6 months to reach full productivity. Expensive in-person training, obsolete PDF manuals, overloaded trainers.
onboarding.impact: Extended time-to-productivity, frustrated new recruits, overwhelmed managers.

skillsGap.title: Growing skills gap
skillsGap.description: Yesterday's skills are no longer enough. 85% of 2030 jobs don't exist yet. Your teams need constant upskilling.
skillsGap.impact: Loss of competitiveness, difficulty innovating, dependence on external recruitment.

budget.title: Unoptimized training budget
budget.description: You invest 2-5% of payroll in training without knowing if it really works. No data, just intuition.
budget.impact: Invisible ROI, difficulty justifying budget to management, waste.

multiSites.title: Unmanageable multi-sites
multiSites.description: Your teams are scattered (Dakar, Abidjan, Nairobi, regional offices). Training everyone consistently is a headache.
multiSites.impact: Uneven training, isolated employees, huge logistical costs.

compliance.title: Compliance and certifications
compliance.description: Proving training compliance (ISO, client audits, local regulations) becomes mission impossible without digital traceability.
compliance.impact: Audit risks, loss of certifications, threatened client contracts.

deployment.q: How long to deploy EduPro in my company?
deployment.a: 48h on average from payment to access for your first employees. Day 1: configuration and admin training. Day 2: tests and general deployment. For Enterprise formulas with complex HRIS integrations, plan 1-2 weeks.

content.a: 3 options: 1) Existing marketplace - access to our training created by African experts 2) Autonomous creation - you create with our AI tools 3) Assisted creation - our learning designers create for you (add-on service).

training.q: Do we need to train our employees to use the platform?
training.a: No. EduPro is designed to be intuitive. Your employees receive a welcome email and that's it. We always train your admins/HR to master the back-office (2 to 4h training depending on formula).

offline.a: EduPro is a PWA accessible from any browser. Uploaded videos can be downloaded for offline viewing. For your employees in low connectivity areas, prioritize directly uploaded content.

hris.q: Can we integrate EduPro with our existing HRIS?
hris.a: Yes, but this requires a preliminary study. HRIS integrations are offered as an option and subject to a specific quote after studying your infrastructure.

quality.q: How do you guarantee pedagogical quality?
quality.a: All our trainers follow our Trainer Bootcamp certifying them in professional e-learning content creation. Each training follows microlearning principles: short modules (10-20min), dynamic videos, interactive exercises, contextualized practical cases.

internal.q: Can we add our own internal trainers?
internal.a: Yes! Your subject matter experts can become trainers on the platform. You create a trainer account for them, they access simple AI-assisted creation tools, create their courses, you validate and then publish to your employees.

roi.a: Our clients generally see positive returns from the first months from: training cost reduction (-40 to 60% vs in-person), time-to-productivity (-30 to 50%), turnover reduction (-10 to 20%), productivity gains (+15 to 25%).

timeline.a: Immediate results (Month 1): logistical reduction. Short term (Months 3-6): measurable time-to-productivity improvement. Medium term (12 months): impact on turnover and continuous learning culture established.

support.q: What level of support after deployment?
support.a: We support you at every step with technical support (email, chat, online help center), continuous admin training, detailed documentation and support community. Depending on your formula, priority support option and dedicated Customer Success Manager available.

demo.q: Do you offer demos or trial periods?
demo.a: Yes! We offer free personalized demos (30-45 min) with presentation adapted to your sector, test environment configuration, and answers to your questions. We also offer a 14-day free trial. You receive a detailed business proposal within 48h.

languages.a: The platform supports French and English. Our training content is mainly available in French and English, with some specific content in local languages (Wolof, Swahili, etc.). When you create your internal training, you can use any language.

quality.q: How do you guarantee pedagogical quality?
quality.a: All our trainers follow our Trainer Bootcamp to create professional e-learning content. Each training follows microlearning principles: short modules (10-20min), dynamic videos with subtitles, interactive exercises, contextualized practical cases, immediate feedback. On request, we can audit your internal content.
